title: Inakappe Taishou (General Inakappe)
synopsis: A comedy about a country boy that travels to the city to study judo. He ends up meeting the daughter of a prominent dojo and her judo skilled cat. Each episode features 2 stories.
staff: [['Yanagawa, Shigeru', ['Script']], ['Nakamura, Mitsuki', ['Art Director']], ['Toriumi, Jinzou', ['Planning']], ['Arai, Torao', ['Art Director']]]
